revision.text:
{{Infobox dungeon |name = Altering Cave |image = [[File:Altering Cave.png|thumb]] |caption = An overhead map of Altering Cave. |tokens = 43,000 |location = Sevii Island 6, north of Outcast Island. }} '''Altering Cave''' is a [[Dungeons|dungeon]] in [[Kanto]]. It has 49 tiles arranged in a 7x7 square, including 7 chest tiles, 17 non-boss encounter tiles, and 1 boss encounter tile. Wild Encounters have 720,600 HP.
== Encounter Tables ==
===Wild Encounters===
{| class="wikitable" |- ! Wild Pokémon !! colspan=2|Trainers |- ! Encounter !! Trainer !! Pokémon Team |- | [[File:Zubat.png|40px]] Zubat|| colspan=2 rowspan=7| <center> N/A |- | [[File:Mareep.png|40px]] Mareep |- | [[File:Pineco.png|40px]] Pineco |- | [[File:Houndour.png|40px]] Houndour |- | [[File:Teddiursa.png|40px]] Teddiursa |- | [[File:Aipom.png|40px]] Aipom |- | [[File:Shuckle.png|40px]] Shuckle |}
===Boss Encounters=== {| class="wikitable" |- ! Wild Pokémon !! Base Health !! Boss Trainer !! Pokémon Team !! Base Health |- | [[File:Stantler.png|40px]] Stantler|| rowspan=2|<center> 3,703,000 || colspan=3 rowspan=2|<center>N/A |- | [[File:Smeargle.png|40px]] Smeargle |}
